p: The CFR and susceptibility to symptomatic COVID-19 is higher in the elderly. As there is no definitive therapeutic drug or a vaccine, prevention is the only and the most important strategy for older adults; the added strain of social distancing on this vulnerable population should be acknowledged and managed. Furthermore, studies on immunopathology for determining the severity of SARS-CoV-2 infection are warranted to develop more effective therapeutic and preventive strategies.
